description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the information disclosure vulnerability in the Windows graphics component (CVE-2024-43508), apply the relevant KB updates for your specific Windows version:

1. Identify your current Windows build version:
   - Windows 11 Version 24H2: 10.0.26100.2033
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.4317
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2: 10.0.22621.4317

2. Download and install the updates corresponding to your version from the links below:
   - **For Windows 11 Version 24H2**: KB5044284 - [Download here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - **For Windows 11 Version 23H2**: KB5044285 - [Download here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - **For Windows 11 Version 22H2**: KB5044285 - [Download here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)

3. After installation, restart your system to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
This fix addresses the out-of-bounds read vulnerability that allows potential information disclosure. Ensure your system is updated to the latest build to mitigate this risk.
**Preconditions**:
- Confirm your Windows build version before proceeding with the updates.
- Backup critical data before applying any updates.
